category.name: Integration.NX Manager I-deas
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_show_open_in_ideas_button
preference.preference_description: Specifies if the "Open in I-deas" button should be displayed in the Teamcenter Rich Client. Valid values are true/false. true - Displays the button. false - Does not display the button.
